content: *choose one color of worsted or aran weight yarn to knit this beginner friendly hat pattern this hat is knit in the round with crisp twisted ribbing to keep your head stylish and warm don t forget to pom pom it * **finished measurements** 20 / 51cm circumference **yarn** heavy worsted weight **yardage** color a - 150yds / 137m color b - 30yds / 27m pom pom approximately 20yds / 18m of worsted or chunky yarn for a pom pom **shown in** color a - malabrigo twist 100% merino wool 150yds / 137m per 100g skein colorway sealing wax color b - berroco blackstone tweed 65% wool 25% mohair 10% angora 130yds / 119m per 50g skein colorway steamers **needles** 40 us 9 / 5 5mm circular magic loop method is used for knitting in the round **notions** 1 stitch marker tapestry needle **gauge** 18 sts & 28 row = 4 / 10cm in twisted ribbing **westknits workshops** venture into the world of westknits with my series of online workshops westknits workshops can be watched as many times as you like and at your own pace as you learn new knitting skills sign up here https //www westknits com/collections/workshops **shop yarn at stephen & penelope** find the perfect yarn for your project at stephen & penelope we ship worldwide https //www stephenandpenelope com/ **westknits on youtube** check out my videos on youtube for some helpful tutorials and an exciting insight into the woolly world of westknits https //www youtube com/@stephenwest all rights reserved pattern for personal use only 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/westknits-choreokal-stretch-it 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/westknits-choreokal-stretch-it
